actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Designates membership on the following committees of the House of Representatives: (1) Agriculture; (2) Armed Services; (3) Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs; (4) the Budget; (5) the District of Columbia; (6) Education and Labor; (7) Energy and Commerce; (8) Foreign Affairs; (9) Government Operations; (10) House Administration; (11) Interior and Insular Affairs; (12) the Judiciary; (13) Merchant Marine and Fisheries; (14) Post Office and Civil Service; (15) Public Works and Transportation; (16) Science, Space, and Technology; (17) Small Business; and (18) Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: Designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
